text:
### New
```
POST /api/new
```

Create a new project

Request:
```javascript
{
	"token": "CB23C3395153D2414CE7FF22F925776DBF72BF309",
	"project": "Name of the project" /* Spaces allowed */
}
```

Response success:
```javascript
{
	success: true,
	text: "Created new project: Name of the project"
}
```

Response failure:
```javscript
{
	success: false,
	text: "Invalid token"
}
```
title: POST new
